actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction for expenses incurred by a taxpayer in making repairs and improvements to his residence.

summary.text: Allows a tax deduction of up to $1000 under the Internal Revenue Code for the ordinary and necessary expenses incurred by a taxpayer in making repairs and improvements to his principal residence.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction for expenses incurred by a taxpayer in making repairs and improvements to his residence.
